title: vIra vAzhvE
sahitya:
vIra vAzhvE vAzha vENDum viNNum maNNum viyandu pOTrum


anupallavi

  pAril nAngu nALenrAlum pattu nAzhi tAnenrAlum 
yArum tAzhvu kUroNAda lakSiyamonraik-koNDu ninra


caraNam    mElum mElum tunbam vandu mEvuginra pOdilum vIzhcci kaNDadanri enrum veTriyillai Ayinum 
kAlanE vandAlum accam kATTinAlum koNDadOr karaiyilA nark-koLgaitanaik-kaiviDAda urudi pongum
